properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:25AM EST until January 20 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for portions of the following waterways in central and
southern Indiana...

Big Blue River...East Fork White River...Flatrock River...
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has upgraded the
flood category from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers and streams in Illinois...Indiana...

White River at Hazleton

...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has upgraded the
flood category from Minor to Moderate severity for the following
rivers and streams

Driftwood River near Edinburgh 2 SW
East Fork White River at Seymour
White River near Centerton
White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant
White River at Spencer
White River at Elliston
White River at Edwardsport
White River at Petersburg


.With rainfall totals between 1 to 2 inches there are
widespread flooding concerns across much of Indiana. Over the next
couple of days we will see another 1 to 3 inches of rain or more
possible.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the East Fork White River near Bedford.
* from Tuesday morning to Monday January 20.
* There have been no observations in the last 24 hours.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast...It is forecast to rise above flood stage Tuesday
morning, crest at 24.8 feet Thursday morning and then fall below
flood stage by Monday January 20.
* At 25.0 feet...Extensive lowland flooding is in progress.  Bedford
boat club is accessed by boat only.  Some local residents walk to
their homes.  Several roads are closed including SR 450 east of
Williams and Stumphole Bridge Rd. in Western Lawrence County.
